Content:: This list of United States disasters by death toll includes disasters that occurred either in the United States, at diplomatic missions of the United States, or incidents outside of the United States in which a number of U.S. citizens were killed. Epidemics with lower death tolls are not included below. See List of epidemics for global statistics. (2005) (2003) Gallipolis, Ohio Crest Hill, Illinois
Title: List of disasters in the United States by death toll - Wikipedia
